articles.description: The move comes a fortnight after Accenture guided for weaker-than-expected revenue growth in the fiscal ending August 2024.
articles.content:
Accenture Plc. has held back salary hikes for its employees in India and Sri Lanka, citing a macro environment that was more challenging than anticipated.
